column1: Smoque BBQ////Yum! This place is so tasty. Tried the ribs on my last visit so I wanted to give other things on the menu a chance. Finally got to try the brisket that everyone was raving about and its very tasty. You are given two bbq sauce to choose from so that's a plus. The customer service was awesome. They were friendly and very helpful. The mac and cheese and cornbread is the bomb dot com.
